text: Kasone, ki saʙu ruz pinhon va oskoro moli xudro ʙaroi rizoijati Alloh nafaqa mekunand, podosason nazdi Parvardigorason ast va na tarse dar oxirat ʙar onhost va dar dunjo, az on ci ki az onho favt sud, anduhgin namesavand. Dar nafaqa kardan ʙar kamʙaƣalon karomat va izzat ast va pokii moli sarvatmandon ast va ʙo jakdigar madad kardan ʙa nekui va taqvo ast. In guna fazlu ʙuzurgiro ʙanda dar rizoijati Alloh metavonad joft, na dar sadaqa kardan ʙa qahr jo macʙuri
